scripts.start:postgres: docker run -e POSTGRES_DB=postchain -e POSTGRES_USER=postchain -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postchain --network yours_network -p 5432:5432 -d --name postgres postgres:14.1-alpine
scripts.start: npm run start:network && npm run start:postgres && sleep 5 && node scripts/start.js dev
scripts.stop: docker rm -f -v yours_blockchain postgres || true && docker network rm yours_network || true
scripts.prestart:test: npm run stop && npm run start:network && npm run start:postgres
